ModMetaData.name: Advanced Mortar (Continued)
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/buuPQel.png[/img] Update of $$$s mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1622501189
- Updated the price since the Vanilla turret is more expensive now - Works well with the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2339394453]Advanced Mini-Turret+[/url] mod by velcroboy333 - Seems enemies will now use the mortars as well, if they can afford them - Uses the reinforced barrel-mechanic if enabled, same as vanilla mortars.
